products.name: Complete Seasoning
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Condiments, Spices
products.facts: ["Complete Seasoning - 793.8 gr is made from a blend of natural herbs and spices.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting eco-friendliness.","It contains no artificial preservatives or flavors, ensuring high quality.","The seasoning is gluten-free, making it suitable for a variety of diets."]

products.name: Lindt Excellence 90% Cocoa Dark Chocolate
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Cocoa and its products, Chocolates, Dark chocolates, Dark chocolate bar with more than 70% cocoa, en:chocolate-candies
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality cocoa beans sourced from sustainable farms.","Contains 90% cocoa content, providing a rich and intense chocolate flavor.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials that promote sustainability.","Free from artificial flavors and preservatives, ensuring a pure chocolate experience."]

products.name: Super Chunk Peanut Butter
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Fats, Spreads, Nuts and their products, Plant-based spreads, Vegetable fats, Oilseed purees, Legume butters, Nut butters, Peanut butters
products.facts: ["Super Chunk Peanut Butter is made from high-quality roasted peanuts.","It contains no added sugars or hydrogenated oils, ensuring a natural taste.","The product is packaged in recyclable materials to minimize environmental impact.","Super Chunk is gluten-free and suitable for various dietary needs."]

products.name: SUPER CHUNK Peanut Butter
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Spreads, Plant-based spreads, Oilseed purees, Legume butters, Peanut butters, en:nut-butters
products.facts: ["Made with only roasted peanuts and salt, ensuring a simple ingredient list.","The peanuts used are sourced from sustainable farms, promoting eco-friendly practices.","Contains no added sugars or hydrogenated oils, maintaining high quality and purity.","Packaged in recyclable materials, supporting environmental sustainability."]

products.name: Pure Pumpkin Puree
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Fruits and vegetables based foods, Canned foods, Vegetables based foods, Canned plant-based foods, Canned vegetables, Pumpkin and Squash plant products, Pumpkins and their products, Pumpkins, Pumpkin pulp
products.labels: No gluten, No GMOs, No preservatives, All natural
products.facts: ["Made from 100% pure pumpkin with no additives or preservatives.","Packaged in BPA-free cans to ensure safety and quality.","Sourced from sustainable farms that prioritize eco-friendly practices.","Rich in vitamins A and C, providing nutritional benefits with low calories."]

products.name: Mae ploy Red curry paste 400g
products.categories: Condiments, Sauces, Curry pastes, Red curry pastes, Groceries
products.facts: ["Mae Ploy Red Curry Paste is made from a blend of fresh herbs and spices, including red chili, garlic, and lemongrass.","The product is gluten-free and contains no artificial preservatives, ensuring a more natural ingredient profile.","Mae Ploy sources its ingredients sustainably, focusing on quality and ecological impact in its production processes.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, aligning with environmentally friendly practices."]

products.name: Vegan dressing & spread
products.categories: Condiments, Fats, Sauces, Salad dressings, Groceries
products.facts: ["Vegan dressings and spreads are typically made from plant-based ingredients such as nuts, seeds, fruits, and vegetables.","Many vegan dressings use ingredients like olive oil, avocado, or tahini, which are considered healthier fats compared to traditional dressings that may contain dairy or eggs.","The production of vegan dressings generally has a lower carbon footprint compared to dressings made with animal products, contributing to reduced greenhouse gas emissions.","Vegan dressings are often free from artificial preservatives and additives, promoting higher quality and more natural ingredients."]

products.name: Original Pretzel Crisps
products.categories: Snacks,Salty snacks,Appetizers,Chips and fries,Biscuits and crackers,Crisps,Crackers
products.facts: ["Original Pretzel Crisps are made from high-quality wheat flour, ensuring a crispy texture.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting eco-friendliness.","They contain no artificial preservatives, enhancing their quality and taste.","The product is low in fat and cholesterol, making it a healthier snack option."]

products.name: Organic Ketchup
products.labels: Organic,USDA Organic,Quality Assurance International Certified Organic
products.facts: ["Organic ketchup is made from tomatoes grown without synthetic pesticides or fertilizers.","The production of organic ketchup typically has a lower environmental impact compared to conventional ketchup.","Organic ketchup often contains fewer additives and preservatives, focusing on natural ingredients.","Many organic ketchup brands prioritize sustainable farming practices and support local farmers."]

products.name: San Marzano Peeled Tomatoes
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Fruits and vegetables based foods,Canned foods,Vegetables based foods,Canned plant-based foods,Vegetables,Canned vegetables,Tomatoes and their products,Tomatoes,Canned tomatoes
products.facts: ["San Marzano tomatoes are grown in the volcanic soil of the San Marzano region in Italy, which contributes to their unique flavor.","They are harvested by hand to ensure quality and prevent damage to the fruit.","San Marzano tomatoes are often packaged in BPA-free cans to promote ecological safety.","These tomatoes are known for their low acidity and sweet flavor, making them a favorite among chefs for sauces and cooking."]

products.name: High Protein Bar
products.ingredients_text: Water, Sugar, Glucose Syrup, Citric Acid, Natural Flavors, Sodium Citrate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Artificial Colors (Red 40, Blue 1)
products.categories: Snacks, Dietary supplements, Bodybuilding supplements, Protein bars
products.facts: ["Made with high-quality protein sources such as whey and plant-based proteins.","Packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting environmental sustainability.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors, ensuring a clean label product.","Sourced from suppliers that adhere to strict quality control standards."]
